rawContent:
# ElderCare - Project Definition
# Elderly care services platform for Israel

[project]
id = "eldercare"
name = "ElderCare"
description = "Digital platform for ordering and managing elderly care services in Israel"
type = "mobile"
version = "0.1.0"

[project.problem]
statement = "Manual handling of care orders via phone creates operational overhead"
impact = "Difficult to track orders, specialist availability, and working hours"

[project.solution]
summary = "Simple mobile apps for clients, specialists, and admins"
coreValue = "Easy ordering without registration, real-time tracking, efficient management"

[project.audience]
primary = "Families needing elderly care services"
secondary = ["Care specialists", "Company administrators"]
market = "Israel"

[features]
list = [
  "Service ordering without mandatory registration",
  "Phone-based client identification",
  "Order status tracking",
  "Specialist work time recording",
  "Availability management",
  "SMS notifications (simulated)"
]

[project.scope]
inScope = [
  "Client mobile app",
  "Specialist mobile app",
  "Admin mobile app",
  "Order lifecycle management",
  "Availability scheduling"
]
outOfScope = [
  "Payment processing",
  "Complex accounting",
  "GPS tracking",
  "In-app messaging"
]

[project.platforms]
list = ["client-app", "specialist-app", "admin-app"]
shared = ["entities", "services", "components"]

[owner]
name = "ElderCare Team"
email = "team@eldercare.il"
